title: Large-Scale Integrated STEM (iSTEM) Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics) concepts and job-based problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing iSTEM learning tools based on real-world job cases through multidisciplinary team composition. Participants use personal devices (BYOD) with the digital collaboration platform (CODEM for iSTEM)

learning_goals: Develop educational tools by applying iSTEM’s six core principles—problem-based learning, interdisciplinary integration, modeling, inquiry-based learning, design-based learning, and collaborative learning—through a collaborative design process.
Collaborate with multidisciplinary team members to solve complex problems in real-world work environments using an integrated STEM approach.
Design user-centered iSTEM learning scenarios and assessment rubrics utilizing design thinking methodologies.

resources: CODEM for iSTEM Digital Collaboration Platform

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
